kralien.transmit: You call that a ship? Where I come from thatâ€™s a rusting bucket of table scraps!.
kralien.failure: Your ship is rustier and also very stupid, {name}.
kralien.success: Rust you say? Prepare to meet the gods, Terran infidel!
kralien.science: The captain is very proud of their beautiful ship.

kralien.transmit: Hey maser-mouth! The deadliest weapon on that pathetic excuse for a ship is your ugly face!
kralien.failure: And your face is soft like a dung heap, {name}. You are being ignored.
kralien.success: Your face will be shredded by these mighty weapons!
kralien.science: The captain is vain and proud of their handsome face.

kralien.transmit: Hey wormface! I'm using your Holy Scrolls to wipe my stinky feet!
kralien.failure: You can stick those superstitions up your excrement orifice, {name}.
kralien.success: For your blasphemy you shall immediately die!
kralien.science: The captain is zealously devout to the Kralien religion.

kralien.transmit: Hey excrement head! You are a pathetic failure at rent collection!
kralien.failure: You know nothing, {name}. No further messages will be received.
kralien.success: Rent collection is not to be insulted! Prepare to die, {name}!
kralien.science: The captain believes they are the best rent collectors in the fleet.

kralien.transmit: Hey wide-mouth! It's easy to puff up your reputation when you always run from a real fight!
kralien.failure: You are not worth the effort, {name}. Go annoy someone else.
kralien.success: Your pathetic ship will be obliterated, {name}!
kralien.science: The captain was recently overheard bragging about his spotless reputation in a space-bar.

kralien.transmit: Hey rodent-face! If you skitter away like a frightened hatchling, do you have to give that shiny medal back?
kralien.failure: Fools will not be heard, {name}. Cease all communication.
kralien.success: Insolence will not be tolerated, {name}. Prepare for death!
kralien.science: The captain was recently awarded a commendation for bravery by the High Priest Council.

kralien.transmit: Hey stink-bug! I can smell your rancid body odor from the other side of this sector!
kralien.failure: Your bad-words bounce off Kralien chitin, {name}. Do not bother Kraliens again.
kralien.success: Kraliens will bathe in your blood, insolent primates! Prepare to die!
kralien.science: The captain has not molted recently and may be sensitive about his personal hygiene.

kralien.transmit: Hey bug-brain! You're so stupid, one of these asteroids could out-think you!
kralien.failure: This obvious taunt will be ignored, {name}. Go annoy someone else.
kralien.success: Your pathetic ship will be crushed {name}. Your brain most resembles a rock!
kralien.science: The captain was criticized by his classmates at the Academy for sub-standard grades.

kralien.transmit: Hey pipsqueek! Are you ready to fight with the big people, or should you run back home to your hive-mommy?
kralien.failure: The hive-mother teaches that useless fools should be ignored, {name}. Cease communication.
kralien.success: You will learn respect when your ship is blasted into tiny pieces of scrap metal!
kralien.science: The captain was the smallest hatchling in his egg cluth, and is sensitive about his stature.

kralien.transmit: Are the High Priests giving such big toys to hatchlings now? Bring it over here, and it might get broken!
kralien.failure: Wise Kraliens ignore tricks like this, {name}. Go play games with someone else.
kralien.success: Worthless Terrans! The wages of your insolence will be paid only with agony and death!
kralien.science: The captain is young and inexperienced. They may be over-eager to prove themselves in battle.

arvonian.transmit: Where did you get that awful uniform? You look like you mugged a homeless jellyfish.
arvonian.failure: You ignorant dimwit, {name}. Uniforms are merely clothing, and yours is repulsive.
arvonian.success: For insulting my uniform I shall destroy your hideous hide, {name}!
arvonian.science: The captain is fashion conscious and proud of their attractive uniform.

arvonian.transmit: Your Queen looks like a hideous pustule and smells like a flatulent Space Whale!
arvonian.failure: You're right, {name}. I despise that whole pompous family.
arvonian.success: I shall avenge your insult in the name of the Queen, {name}!
arvonian.science: The captain loves the Arvonian royal family.

arvonian.transmit: Your Supreme Understander is a tin-boxed wind-up toy!
arvonian.failure: Perhaps it is, {name}, but a tin-boxed wind-up toy is still smarter than you.
arvonian.success: Our Supreme Understander has decreed that you must die now, {name}!
arvonian.science: The captain has unfailing faith in the decisions of the Arvonian Supreme Understander.

arvonian.transmit: I shoot harmless space whales just to listen to them scream!
arvonian.failure: You are mentally ill, {name}, but I'm not going to do anything about it.
arvonian.success: You are horrible, {name}! I shall kill you to avenge those noble creatures!
arvonian.science: The captain is particularly fond of space whales.

arvonian.transmit: Hey vomit-face! You can change faces all you want, but there's no way to fix that much ugly!
arvonian.failure: If you find my face so objectionable, then I shall remove it. Ending all communications, {name}.
arvonian.success: Your miserable hides might make an adorable handbag, {name}! Prepare to die!
arvonian.science: The captain has won several beauty pageants, and is proud of their appearance.

arvonian.transmit: Did you get that warship from your mommy? Do you know how to use it, or was it just to make you feel better?
arvonian.failure: Your idiotic chatter bores me, {name}. No further communication.
arvonian.success: What would a bunch of smelly primates know about good breeding? Your bloodlines end today, Terrans!
arvonian.science: The captain receieved their commission because they are the eldest child of a famous war hero.

arvonian.transmit: Hey snot-head! I heard you're too dumb to play cards. I bet you can't fight, either!
arvonian.failure: Don't bother me with your silly games, {name}. Go play with someone else.
arvonian.success: You want to play games, {name}? Prepare for a lesson in death and destruction!
arvonian.science: The captain recently got into a fight over a mala-mala game after another player criticized their intelligence.

arvonian.transmit: Wow, I haven't seen an Arvonian move that fast since you got scared and ran away at the Battle of Gemini Rift!
arvonian.failure: You're not worth the bother, {name}. Find someone else to annoy.
arvonian.success: Many brave Arvonians died that day, {name}. Prepare to join them!
arvonian.science: The captain was reprimanded at the Battle of Gemini Rift for failing to engage the enemy.

arvonian.transmit: Your superiors must not consider us a threat, if they are throwing their dregs and washouts after us!
arvonian.failure: Your prattling nonsense is beneath me, {name}. Communications ceased.
arvonian.success: The vysama-worm eats both the queen and manure-farmer, {name}. Your corpses will provide a feast for them!
arvonian.science: The captain was sponsored by a disgraced family, and is sensitive about their lack of family connections.

arvonian.transmit: Naval Intelligence found your birth certificate. Turns out your parents were zuniki-slugs!
arvonian.failure: I wasn't born yesterday, {name}. We are done listening to your nonsense.
arvonian.success: How curious. Our Naval Intelligence found your death certificates. We have already signed them for you!
arvonian.science: The captain was an orphan, and doesn't like to talk about the circumstances of their birth.

torgoth.transmit: Hey Jumbo! Your pod-mother is a Space Whale!
torgoth.failure: You are an idiot, {name}. My pod-mother died years ago.
torgoth.success: You shall die for insulting my pod-mother, {name}!
torgoth.science: The captain loves their pod-mother and visits her frequently.

torgoth.transmit: You are so ugly, your spouse will thank me for killing you.
torgoth.success: I shall crush your skull with my bare hands for insulting my spouse, {name}!
torgoth.science: The captain and their spouse have a very stable, loving relationship.

torgoth.transmit: Take a bath, you fungus-infested pachyderm!
torgoth.failure: Then I am the last thing the Terrans will smell as I destroy all your ships and bases.
torgoth.success: How dare you insult my hygiene? Prepare to die, {name}!
torgoth.science: The captain is meticulous and proud of their impeccable hygiene.

torgoth.transmit: Hey Torgie! Let's lay down our weapons and sing Kumbaya!
torgoth.failure: You have the voice of a dying space whale, {name}. I'm closing this channel so I won't hear you sing.
torgoth.success: How insulting! We're coming to kill you now, {name}!
torgoth.science: The captain is a warmonger who finds the idea of peace offensive.

torgoth.transmit: Can't that thing move any faster? My grandmother can move faster than that... and she's dead!
torgoth.failure: Patience, {name}. Your inevitable death will come soon enough.
torgoth.success: Death comes to us all, {name}. Apparently your time has arrived. Full speed ahead!
torgoth.science: At the last refit, maintenance records show that the captain complained about the ship's lack of speed.

torgoth.transmit: Hey there, squid-face! If you're too scared to fight, maybe you could surrender to our shuttle?
torgoth.failure: That is old history, {name}. Today is another day. No further communication.
torgoth.success: We will not tolerate such insolence, {name}! We will destroy you!
torgoth.science: The captain surrendered a Behemoth-class dreadnought to a pirate scout at the Battle of Polaris Wharf.

torgoth.transmit: Hey grass-eater! We've got a delicious fruit salad over here, it would look great on your trophy wall!
torgoth.failure: An amusing joke, but we have no use for humor. Enjoy your fruit salad, {name}.
torgoth.success: I will display this fruit salad right next to your skulls, {name}. Prepare to die!
torgoth.science: The captain was spotted eating in a vegetarian restaurant three months ago.

torgoth.transmit: Hey ch'thotgh! We were expecting someone a little taller, can we get you a step-stool?
torgoth.failure: I am tall enough to know a fool when I see one, {name}. End communication.
torgoth.success: We will see how tall you are after I have trampled you to death, Terran!
torgoth.science: The captain is shorter than most Torgoth, a race that places considerable emphasis on physical size.

torgoth.transmit: Hey melon-brain! I've met cabbages that are smarter than you!
torgoth.failure: Even a cabbage can see through this pointless ruse, {name}. Go bother someone else.
torgoth.success: Insolent fledgelings! We will see how smart you are when I split your skulls open!
torgoth.science: A double-agent reported the captain is a slow-thinking, plodding tactiction, and gets angry when questioned.

torgoth.transmit: Hey love-handles! We heard from NuVeenu's Love Nest, they got a tall one already waiting for you!
torgoth.failure: You must be mistaken, {name}. I have never been to such a place. Do not speak again.
torgoth.success: You are disgusting, {name}! How dare you! I will rid the galaxy of your filth!
torgoth.science: The captain was spotted entering an Arvonian pleasure-palace, and reportedly prefers them tall and skinny.

skaraan.transmit: Hey Skaraan! Your ship is so slow it leaves a slime trail!
skaraan.failure: So does your mother, {name}. Now watch my slow ship kill a bunch of worthless Terrans.
skaraan.success: I have the fastest ship in the galaxy, {name}. And it's about to blow you to smithereens!
skaraan.science: The captain is proud to command the fastest ship in the galaxy.

skaraan.transmit: You penniless pauper! Your portfolio sucks like a black hole!
skaraan.failure: I won't even dignify your worthless crew and squalid ship with a reaction, {name}.
skaraan.success: How dare you insult my finances, {name}? I shall enjoy earning the bonus for killing you!
skaraan.science: The captain is financially savvy and particularly proud of their investment portfolio.

skaraan.transmit: You insignificant flunky! Go home to your mommy and send someone more important to fight me!
skaraan.failure: Whatever you say, {name}. Right now I'm enjoying the company of YOUR mommy.
skaraan.success: How dare you insult my status? I shall mount your lifeless heads on my wall as trophies, {name}!
skaraan.science: The captain is very status conscious and believe they are a very important person.

skaraan.transmit: Hey, horse-face! If I was that ugly, I'd hide behind a cloaking device, too!
skaraan.failure: Your annoying taunts will not work on us, {name}. Go annoy someone else.
skaraan.success: Worthless Terrans! I will obliterate you!
skaraan.science: The captain spends a considerable portion of their salary on skin treatments and hair stylists.

skaraan.transmit: Wow, what an ancient rust-bucket! Is that all you could afford, cheap-skate?
skaraan.failure: Oh, this old thing? Well, she's got it where it counts, {name}. Communication ended.
skaraan.success: We got these battle-scars by tearing apart idiots like you, {name}. Prepare to die!
skaraan.science: The ship is an older model, and maintenance records suggest the captain is having trouble paying for repairs.

skaraan.transmit: Hey flunky! We've got a promotion for you over here. We could use another deputy assistant boot-licker!
skaraan.failure: Go lick your own boots, {name}. We've got better things to do than listen to you.
skaraan.success: I've got one for you, too, {name}! You've been promoted from worthless scum to pathetic cannon-fodder!
skaraan.science: The captain has been passed-over for promotion five times.

skaraan.transmit: Hey sweet-cheeks! We found your tail in Lyra sector, you can have it back if you say 'pretty please'!
skaraan.failure: I have nothing to say to you, {name}. Ending communications.
skaraan.success: When I'm done with you, {name}, there won't be anything left of you to bury!
skaraan.science: The captain lost their tail during the Battle of Lyra 6, and spent three months regrowing a new one.

skaraan.transmit: Hey snot-ball! Are you really here to fight, or will you just run away and file another fake report?
skaraan.failure: I assure you, all our paperwork is in order, {name}. No further communication.
skaraan.success: Nothing will give me greater satisfaction than reporting on your untimely demise, {name}!
skaraan.science: One of our agents found out the captain has been falsifying their battle-reports to build up their reputation.

skaraan.transmit: Hey fancy-pants! You sure you want to bring that shiny trinket into battle? It might get dirty!
skaraan.failure: We appreciate your conceern for our appearance, but we appear to be ignoring you, {name}.
skaraan.success: Worthless Terrans! We will rid the galaxy of your filth!
skaraan.science: The captain demands their ship be kept excessively clean, and frequently brags about it's pristine appearance.

skaraan.transmit: Hey snot-brain! I bet you're so dumb, you file your taxes with a tail-rasp!
skaraan.failure: We have no interest in your attempts at humor, {name}. End communications.
skaraan.success: How dare you, {name}! You will not find it so funny when we destroy you!
skaraan.science: The captain has been recongized for his financial skills, but is not regarded as a particularly smart tactician.

ximni.transmit: Your father is so stupid he thinks planets are tiny plans.
ximni.failure: And you are stupid for believing I would react to that, {name}!
ximni.success: My father is a genius, {name}! For insulting him you shall die!
ximni.science: The captain is proud that his father is a famous scientific genius.

ximni.transmit: You selfish simpleton! You don't know the meaning of the word xim!
ximni.failure: I know only a ximless Terran stooge would use such a pointless insult, {name}.
ximni.success: How dare you insult my xim? My vengence will be your death, {name}!
ximni.science: The captain once failed the traditional test of xim and still feels bitter about it.

ximni.transmit: You wouldnâ€™t dare fight me, you cowering Lepusian mud mouse!
ximni.failure: I'll get around to fighting you eventually, {name}. Right now I have other Terrans to defeat.
ximni.success: I have ten times your courage, {name}! And I am coming to kill you!
ximni.science: One of our agents has reported that the captain is inexperienced and insecure about his own courage.

ximni.transmit: You are an insipid humdrum who no one wants at their parties!
ximni.failure: You're such a dreary milquetoast, {name}. I'm blocking you.
ximni.success: This party will be your last! Arm weapons! Destroy {name}!
ximni.science: The captain is proud of their wild reputation for drinking and carousing.

ximni.transmit: Hey, neblir-kanedil! We took a vote, and we all agree, you are a sniveling nitwit!
ximni.failure: How droll, {name}. We took another vote, and we all decided to ignore you.
ximni.success: We took another vote, {name}, and we all decided to destroy you!
ximni.science: The captain has made public statements that are critical of the Ximni's democratic government.

ximni.transmit: Hey, fenol-harkelag! We heard you singing earlier, and it was so abom we almost surrendered!
ximni.failure: You're the one with the annoying voice, {name}. We will no longer listen to it.
ximni.success: We will sing about our glorious victory after we annihilate you, {name}. Too bad you won't be around to hear it!
ximni.science: The captain is proud of his singing voice, but is considered by shipmates to be more enthusiastic than talented.

ximni.transmit: Hey, voret-za! You might as well run away. Your worthless clan never sticks around for a real fight!
ximni.failure: When the battle ends, we shall see who remains, {name}. Until then, no further communication.
ximni.success: Pathetic Terrans! Our clan will sing of your stupidity at your funeral, {name}!
ximni.science: The captain's clan has a reputation for being unreliable and duplicitous.

ximni.transmit: Hey, kaljotel-asinowit! Your gedovatin called us, she said you'd better give up before you get everyone killed!
ximni.failure: If you want to listen to that wendin-kikal, {name}, maybe you should take her advice. Communication ended.
ximni.success: Lesmikni azulfes! Your death with be excrutiatingly painful, {name}!
ximni.science: The captain's mother-in-law has made frequent comments about their lack of intelligence and poor leadership skills.

ximni.transmit: Hey, geleronil! You better run away, we know you can't win unless you cheat like a fom-loponal!
ximni.failure: We don't have time for your silly games, {name}. Go play with someone else.
ximni.success: You want to raise the stakes, {name}? How about a fight to the death!
ximni.science: The captain was caught cheating in a mala-mala tournement a few months ago.

ximni.transmit: Hey, lepon-ashon! Are those guns shooting blanks? Because we know the captain is!
ximni.failure: We don't know what you're talking about, {name}. Go annoy someone else.
ximni.success: Your concern about our ammunition is noted, {name}. You will be more intimately familiar with it shortly!
ximni.science: The captain's ex-lover told one of our agents that they are infertile and lousy in the sack.
